price: 46. Mpe soki tolingi tokolakisa yo ndambu ya etumbu oyo tokani тропа bango, to mpe okokufa liboso mpo ete eyela bango sima nayo, mpe na sima epai na biso nde bakozongisama, mpe na suka Allah azali nzeneneke likolo ya maye bazali kosala.
arabic: وَإِمَّا نُرِيَنَّكَ بَعۡضَ ٱلَّذِي نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَنَّكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-immā nuriyannaka baʿḍa alladhī naʿiduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilaynā marjiʿuhum thumma al-lahu shahīdun ʿalā mā yafʿalūna
